Summary: orange glowing orbs.very low. gained altitude in a straight line. one behind the other.
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving in my car saw Two orange orbs. Thought it was part of the meteor shower. Stopped car and put down window. Heard no sound. Then watched as Two others came from behind trees and followed the Two orbs. Slowly rising then picking up speed until out of sight.location longstown.
trends: There have been no other sightings in East York
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
